flowchart.name: Podium Tower
flowchart.description:
Podium with tower with parameters for setting various dimensions.

pod_height: [6,12,18]
pod_length: [30, 40, 50]
pod_width: [20, 30, 40]
pod_floor_height: [4, 5, 6]
tower_length: [20, 30, 40]
tower_width: [10, 15, 20]
tower_height: [20, 30, 40]
tower_floor_height: [2.2, 2.7, 3.1]

meta.description: Height of each floor within the podium.
